title: Rendering of <tspan> element not working...
body:
Hi,
I just tested a SVG produced by SVGMaker from a Microstation file. The file has produced the piece of following SVG...
<text font-family="Arial" font-size="46" fill="#000000" font-weight="700" font-style="italic">
<tspan x="7212,7243,7268,7296,7321,7339,7364" y="3561">Repère </tspan>
...
</text>
The <tspan> element is conform to SVG spécification, but the format of x coordinate is not taken into account in SkiaSharp SVG and is set to 0 (normal as far I saw in the source code). So all the texts defined are put at the left side of the SVG drawing....

I have a temporary solution as I can force SVGMaker to draw text whether to use text, but I think it would be good to add implementation of the specification for text/tspan in the library.

Regards.

Eric.
